boardgame.name: Verräter
フェレータ
boardgame.description: This board game masquerading as a card game is about a conflict between two factions, the Rose and the Eagle. In each turn, players attempt to change the allegiance of one land district, contributing power cards to swing the conflict in their favor. Players also choose roles such as Diplomat, Traitor, and Builder that give them special abilities for that turn. The most potentially devastating role is that of the Verr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;auml;ter, or Traitor, which allows the player to change allegiances just as the conflict begins. Points are awarded for winning over districts, for taking certain roles, and for building counting-houses._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameversion: Adlung Spiele SdJ Selection List Logo edition

listing.notes: Shipping at actual cost dependend on destination, total weight and method of shipment chosen. I accept payments via paypal, but only if the buyer is willing to cover the fees they charge me (2.9% fee + 1% cross border fee).
PRICE INCLUDES SHIPPING!

Shipping is EUR 4.00 within Europe or $7.00 worldwide. The delivery time varies from 1 to 2 weeks. I can offer even more games upon request. never played +++++ german version, but game parts are almost completely language independent and you can find rules translations on boardgamegeek +++++ will be shipped with insurance +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia or australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for other non-euro-countries : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich by the way is cost-free !) +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped and the weight), pleask at for shipping prices, before you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros, including insurance

Condition - New in shrink-wrap Payment by PayPal in advance or cash on pickup. For shipping this is considered a very small size game. The following options are available for delivery within the continental United States: 1) Local pickup in the San Jose, California area (no cost) 2) USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate - $6.60 (small), $12.65 (medium), or $17.15 (large), depending on game size. Generally very small games fit in the small box, small or medium in the medium box, and large in the large box. Box fits for some games are very snug, allowing minimal protective padding - if this shipping option is picked for such games seller assumes no responsibility for damage during transit. 3) USPS Parcel Select Ground / Non-Flat Rate Priority - varies, usually only cheaper than Flat Rate Priority for small and very light weight games (under 2 pounds), an additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. 4) FedEx Ground - varies, usually from $12 for short distance shipments of light weight games to $30 for heavy games (or multiple games up to 10 pounds) long distance shipments. This is usually the cheapest option for very large games. An additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. While expensive, this is the best method if damage during transit is a concern, as all items will be packed in boxes sufficiently sized for protective materials. Shipping rates to Alaska or Hawaii will be higher for FedEx. Games will not be shipped by any method other than a shipping box, nor unboxed or in less than complete condition, please do not ask.

Seminal card game of choosing roles as players try to bring districts under the aegis of one or other faction in a medieval land. Cracking stuff. Note this a German edition, but I provide English rules (also available on BGG). The price shown is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT). For purchasers outside the EU, the price is £5.00 (net of UK tax) - note that the purchaser is responsible for paying any duty or tax due on import to their country. I charge shipping at cost, as follows. UK addresses: £2.79 (myHermes, takes 2-3 working days, tracked) Other EU countries: £4.92 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Europe outside the EU: £4.10 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Australasia: £5.60 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) USA, Canada _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; elsewhere: £5.15 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked)
